events.message: I ordered a pair of shoes last week, but they don't fit at all. I'd like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been identified as a refund request related to sizing and customer dissatisfaction.
The case has been assigned to customer service agent Lisa M. for assistance with the refund process.
Hello! I'm Lisa from customer support. I understand you want to return the shoes and get a refund. I'm here to help.
Could you please confirm the order number and let me know if the shoes are unused and in their original packaging?
Sure, the order number is 123456789. The shoes are brand new, and I still have the original box and tags attached.
Thank you for the info. I have initiated the refund process. Please send the shoes back using the prepaid return label I will email shortly.
Thanks for your quick help! I appreciate the prepaid label and will send the shoes back today.
We have received your returned shoes and processed the refund. The amount should reflect in your account within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm you received the refund and are satisfied with the resolution of your refund request.
Yes, I received the refund today. Thanks again for the smooth and fast process, Iâ€™m very happy with the support.
Closing this case now as the refund has been completed and the customer has confirmed satisfaction with the solution provided.
